website_summaries.verdict: A combination detangle and primer spray from a trusted brand.
pros: This vitamin and nutrient-packed spray is ideal for detangling before styling, as it is designed to enhance styling products while moisturizing and smoothing hair
cons: The scent is not for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine straight hair

I just wash my hair, pat it with a towel to take out some of the water, and spray this on. My hair brushes out easily, detangles immediately, and is ready for the next step.
